alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:44PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Forest, Florence, Marinette, northern Oconto and northeastern Langlade Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 744 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wisconsin Slough Natural Area to near North Otter Creek Natural Area to near Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tipler and Wisconsin Slough Natural Area around 750 PM CDT. Whisker Lake Wilderness and Carter around 800 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Fern, Goodman, Florence, McCaslin Mountain Natural Area and Pembine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County
